The 7 Best AI Tools in 2025 (Tried & Tested)

1. ChatGPT (not Deepseek)
2. OpusClip (not Submagic)
3. Blink (not Replit) 
4. Nano banana (not ChatGPT)
5. Perplexity (not Google)
6. Gamma (not Canva) 
7. Wispr (not Keyboard)
8. Claude (not ChatGPT)
9. Granola (not Otter)

☑ ChatGPT
↳ to replace Deepseek.
↳ advanced chat for research and tasks.
↳ deep search, smart answers, fast results.

☑ OpusClip 
↳ to replace Submagic.
↳ best for video subtitles and captions.
↳ auto-generate, edit, and style in seconds.

☑ Blink
↳ to replace Replit.
↳ code, build, and deploy in your browser.
↳ instant feedback, real-time collaboration.

☑ Nano banana pro 
↳ to replace ChatGPT.
↳ create images, write, and brainstorm.
↳ now with Nano for fast, smart visuals.

☑ Perplexity
↳ to replace Google.
↳ the gold standard for search.
↳ find anything, anywhere, anytime.

☑ Gamma
↳ to replace Canva.
↳ top tool for slides and website.
↳ design stunning presentations with prompts.

☑ Wispr
↳ to replace Keyboard.
↳ voice-to-text made simple.
↳ type with your voice, hands-free.

☑ Claude
↳ to replace ChatGPT.
↳ write, edit, and polish your work.
↳ clear, fast, and always on point.

☑ Granola
↳ to replace Otter.
↳ best for meeting notes and transcripts.
↳ record, transcribe, and organize with AI.
